examples.korean: Why should I buy expensive art when I can make my own. (Piero Milani) 발음듣기 나 스스로 비싼 예술작품을 만들어 낼 수 있는데 굳이 뭐하러 그런 걸 사야 합니까. (피에로 밀라니, 예술명언) 명언/속담
examples.english: Why should I buy expensive art when I can make my own. (Piero Milani) 발음

examples.korean: You should have waited at home. 발음듣기 집에서 기다리지 뭐하러 나왔어. Neungyule
examples.english: You should have waited at home. 발음

examples.korean: Why'd you get so many fruits. They'll spoil in this heat. 발음듣기 뭐하러 과일을 그렇게 많이 샀어? 이런 더위엔 상할텐데. Neungyule
examples.english: Why'd you get so many fruits. They'll spoil in this heat. 발음

examples.korean: If there were no such things as calories, I would probably never ever buy it. 발음듣기 운동 부족으로 살찔 걱정만 없다면, 도대체 뭐하러 이런 게임을 사겠어요? YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: If there were no such things as calories, I would probably never ever buy it. 발음

examples.korean: Why bother? 발음듣기 뭐하러 그래? YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
